official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a study to determine the need for a National Forest Information Center and an expended environmental education program in New Mexico.
short_title: Enchanted National Forests Information and Education Study Act of 1990

summary.text: Enchanted National Forests Information and Education Study Act of 1990 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, acting through the Chief of the Forest Service, to study the opportunities for establishing a center providing information on the national forests in New Mexico and for expanding the environmental education program for such forests. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Enchanted National Forests Information and Education Study Act of 1990
A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a study to determine the need for a National Forest Information Center and an expended environmental education program in New Mexico.
